verses.name: Exodus 8:10
verses.text: And he said, To morrow. And he said, Be it according to thy word: that thou mayest know that there is none like unto the Lord our God.

verses.name: Exodus 8:11
verses.text: And the frogs shall depart from thee, and from thy houses, and from thy servants, and from thy people; they shall remain in the river only.

verses.name: Exodus 8:12
verses.text: And Moses and Aaron went out from Pharaoh: and Moses cried unto the Lord because of the frogs which he had brought against Pharaoh.
